original_text: This is the portion of Aaron and of his sons from the Lord's food offerings, from the day they were presented to serve as priests of the Lord.
korean_text: 이는 여호와의 화제물 중에서 아론에게 돌릴 것과 그의 아들들에게 돌릴 것이니 그들을 세워 여호와의 제사장의 직분을 행하게 한 날

sentences.original_text: This is the portion of Aaron and of his sons
from the day they were presented
to serve as priests of the Lord
